[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [ElevationProvider](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.md) &gt; [getHeight](./harp-mapview.elevationprovider.getheight.md)

## ElevationProvider.getHeight() method

Get elevation for a given geo point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getHeight(geoPoint: GeoCoordinates, level?: number): number | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  geoPoint | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | geo position to query height for. |
|  level | number | Optional data level that should be used for getting the elevation. If undefined, the view's visible tile containing the point will be used. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number \| undefined

The height at geoPoint or undefined if no tile was found that covers the geoPoint.
